TECHNIQUE.name: DNS settings
TECHNIQUE.DEPRECATED: This technique version is not maintained anymore, it will no longer be available in the next version of Rudder.

INPUT.NAME: DNS_RESOLVERS_EDIT
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: If checked, the nameservers below will be enforced. If not checked, the nameservers will not be changed.

INPUT.NAME: DNS_RESOLVERS
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: IP address of a DNS server to query to resolve names.

REGEX.error: Please enter a valid IP address or a variable

INPUT.NAME: DNS_SEARCHLIST_EDIT
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: If checked, the search suffixes below will be enforced. If not checked, the DNS search suffix will not be changed.

INPUT.NAME: DNS_SEARCHLIST
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: DNS suffix to append to host names that are not fully qualified.

REGEX.error: Please enter a valid domain name or a variable

INPUT.NAME: DNS_OPTIONS_EDIT
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: If checked, the options below will be enforced. If not checked, the DNS options will not be changed.

INPUT.NAME: DNS_OPTIONS
INPUT.LONGDESCRIPTION: DNS options, specific to the resolv.conf style resolver implementation, like "ndots:2" or "rotate"
